```{=html}
<!-- Hero Section -->
<div class="hero-section">
  <!-- Background Image -->
  <div class="hero-image">
    <img src="www/banner.webp" alt="Banner Image">
  </div>

  <!-- Bright Yellow Responsive Title -->
  <div class="hero-title-overlay scroll-fade">
    Kerala Agrobiodiversity Conference 2025
  </div>

  <!-- Event Details Box -->
  <div class="hero-content">
    <div class="hero-details show">
      <strong>Date: October 16â€“18, 2025<br>
      Venue: College of Agriculture, Vellayani, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India</strong>
      <blockquote>
        An international conference on Community Agrobiodiversity Management in Kerala.
      </blockquote>
      <br>
      <a href="https://registration-link.com" class="btn">Register Now</a>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
/* Hero Section */
.hero-section {
  position: relative;
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  margin-left: calc(-50vw + 50%);
  overflow: hidden;
}

/* Background Image */
.hero-image {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero-image img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  object-position: center;
}

/* Bright Yellow Responsive Title */
.hero-title-overlay {
  position: absolute;
  top: 25%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  z-index: 3;
  font-size: clamp(1.8rem, 4.5vw, 3rem);
  font-weight: 900;
  color: #ffff33; /* bright yellow */
  text-align: center;
  letter-spacing: 1.5px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.85); /* shadow for contrast */
  line-height: 1.2;
  padding: 0 15px;
  max-width: 90%;
  word-break: break-word;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
}

/* Fade on Scroll */
.scroll-fade {
  opacity: 1;
  transition: opacity 0.5s ease;
}
body.scrolled .scroll-fade {
  opacity: 0;
}

/* Event Details Box */
.hero-content {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  text-align: center;
  color: white;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 20px;
  top: 60%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  position: absolute;
}

.hero-details {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  padding: 25px 30px;
  border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 12px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(30px);
  transition: all 0.6s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
}

.hero-details.show {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}

.hero-details strong {
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  color: #ffd700;
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}

.hero-details blockquote {
  font-size: 1.3rem;
  color: #e0f7fa;
  margin: 0;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
}

/* Register Button */
.hero-details .btn {
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  padding: 12px 25px;
  border-radius: 30px;
  border: 2px solid #ffd700;
  color: #ffd700;
  background: transparent;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}

.hero-details .btn:hover {
  background: #ffd700;
  color: black;
}

/* Responsive Styles */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .hero-details {
    padding: 25px 20px;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  .hero-details blockquote {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
  }

  .hero-details .btn {
    font-size: 1rem;
    padding: 12px 25px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 480px) {
  .hero-details strong {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
  }

  .hero-details blockquote {
    font-size: 1.1rem;
  }

  .hero-details .btn {
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    padding: 10px 20px;
  }
}
</style>

<!-- Scroll Fade Script -->
<script>
document.addEventListener('scroll', function () {
  if (window.scrollY > 10) {
    document.body.classList.add('scrolled');
  } else {
    document.body.classList.remove('scrolled');
  }
});
</script>
```
